last_episode_to_air.name: Drag Queen Demo
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jennifer transforms the former home of a famous drag queen into a place for her parents, with a little help from some new friends. Meanwhile, Josh makes a big decision to shrink his breasts.

name: Sweet Home Oklahoma
overview: Jennifer Welch, Josh Welch, Lee Murphy, and Angie “Pumps” Sullivan challenge the conventions of conservative society, while their unique friendships hilariously reveal that the daily triumphs and struggles of small-city life are more wild, fun and memorable than meets the eye.

episodes.name: The Good, the Bad, and the Ok
episodes.overview: We meet three ride-or-die friends who live boldly liberal lives in one of the most conservative states in the nation. Jen and Lee try to get the old Angie "Pumps" back, but the current version isn't going anywhere. Meanwhile, Josh and Jen navigate the role reversal of their post-married life.

episodes.name: The Dating Shame
episodes.overview: Lee goes on a blind date for the first time in 17 years, but Jen and Pumps aren't going to make it easy for her. Josh contemplates his future and is determined to make the most of his summer with the boys.

episodes.name: Hanky Pranky
episodes.overview: The group takes a road trip to Grand Lake for a weekend getaway. Pumps gets mad when Lee and Jen make her the butt of their pranks. Josh irritates everyone with his sexual banter.

episodes.name: The Sippy Cup Saga
episodes.overview: Pumps confesses to being a helicopter mom, but her sippy cup runneth over, so Jen and Lee try their best to set her straight. Josh rebels against his to-do list and Jen is forced to rent-a-husband.

episodes.name: Shrub Hubbub
episodes.overview: Lee seeks revenge on her neighbors for cutting down her tree and makes sure they’ll never forget it! Jen and Roman devise a plan to punk Pumps with an elaborate birthday party for Tubbers.

episodes.name: Animal King-dumb
episodes.overview: Jen throws an elaborate first birthday party for her spoiled service dog, Tubby - just to get Pumps back for hating on him. Pumps and Kay get duped when they're the only ones to arrive at the party in costume.

episodes.name: Mama Drama
episodes.overview: Jen and Josh take their boys to stay with Jen's parents in Texas and face the aftermath of an empty nest. Pumps calls on her mother when she needs a break from the kids.

episodes.name: Happily Never After
episodes.overview: Lee tries to leave the past behind by throwing a big garage sale. Jen and Josh confront an empty nest and Pumps deals with having to move out of Nichols Hills.

episodes.name: Angela's Angus
episodes.overview: The gang road trips to Jen's sister's house in Santa Fe. On the way, Pumps and Lee accept the legendary Big Texan Steak Challenge, and suffer the consequences. Meanwhile, it becomes clear Jen and Josh are on different pages in their relationship.

episodes.name: New Mexico, Old Problems
episodes.overview: The gang continues their visit with Jen's sister in Santa Fe and Pumps vows revenge when she's tricked into taking a strenuous hike. Jen finally comes clean about her relationship fears.

episodes.name: Pumps Strikes Back
episodes.overview: Pumps and Kay connive to get back at Jen for pranking them. As Pumps plots her revenge, Jen and Lee try every excuse to get their friend out of the house, leading to a meditation class from hell.

episodes.name: LGBTQIA-OK
episodes.overview: The gang celebrates at the Gay Pride Parade, where Jen is determined to protest the protesters and Lee commits to log-out of online dating. A pet psychic delves into the dogs' issues and finds that Tubby has a higher purpose.

episodes.name: Boys to Men
episodes.overview: Pumps' oldest son Sam is turning 16 and she tries her best to teach him self-reliance. Josh and the boys show Jen their appreciation.

episodes.name: Make America Skate Again
episodes.overview: Lee's friends help celebrate her 40.5 birthday, and Jen goes all out to make the night unforgettable. Pumps looks for a new house and laments leaving Nichols Hills.

episodes.name: War of the Welches
episodes.overview: Josh fails miserably at running Jen's Instagram, but succeeds at irritating her at every turn. Luckily, he redeems himself when he gets behind a camera. Pumps finds the house she wants to buy and faces moving from Nichols Hills.

episodes.name: Moving Out & Moving On
episodes.overview: Pumps moves out of Nichols Hills with mixed feelings. Jen makes sure that Pumps won't forget her when she gives Pumps the ultimate housewarming gift. Josh ponders his future career options.

episodes.name: Judge's Chambers
episodes.overview: Jennifer Welch and her trusted design team tackle a major renovation in the home of a prominent Judge and his family in an area dubbed the "Beverly Hills" of Oklahoma City. Meanwhile, Josh faces a career crossroads, while Pumps leans into over-mothering her three teenagers.

episodes.name: Pumps It Up!
episodes.overview: Jennifer takes on two drastically different designs – a hip office for one of her best friends and a bedroom for a twelve-year-old girl. Meanwhile, when her daughter reveals she is not a supportive parent, Pumps sets out to prove her wrong and become the ultimate dance mom.

episodes.name: Judge, Jury, and Inspector
episodes.overview: Jennifer tackles the redesign of the judge's office and gives the JWD lobby a makeover; Jennifer is out to get revenge on Tim for his taste-test prank.

episodes.name: Drag Queen Demo
episodes.overview: Jennifer transforms the former home of a famous drag queen into a place for her parents, with a little help from some new friends. Meanwhile, Josh makes a big decision to shrink his breasts.
